newsitem.title: DENMARK: ISS sells off Danish HQ, conference centre.
newsitem.headline: ISS sells off Danish HQ, conference centre.

text.p: Danish cleaning and service group Internatioinal Service System (ISS) said on Thursday it sold its group head office and adjoining conference centre near Copenhagen to U.S. and Scandinavian buyers for approximately 96 million crowns.

It said the 5,000 square metre head office in north Copenhagen was sold to Computer Associates Scandinavia A/S, a subsidiary of Computer Associates Inc of New York, while the ISS University Hotel conference centre was acquired by Scanticon Cornwell A/S.
ISS said group management was considering several options for a new head office.
It said relocation to a new, smaller head office and the sale of the conference centre, was expected to improve group operating profits by five to ten million crowns on an annual basis.
